attributes.action: Replace Theresa May as P.M with a pro leave P.M
attributes.background: Theresa May has again and again shown herself to be weak in leadership and commending little or no respect of her people or indeed her own party. We need urgently to have her replaced with a Prime Minister who can arrange a swift, clean and efficient exit form the clutches of the E.U.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or lose their job. That includes Ministers and the Prime Minister.

The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
